name: Whispering Dream [ Demo ]
description:
Aisly is a little boy who was having his sweet dream after a long time. Different from the usual, he was engaged in quite a realistic dream. As he goes, someone was trying to wake him up from his sleep...?

Info :

- it will realize full on December- January 

- Is better to wait fully realise unless you want to play 2x ( because the ending is near with the demo )

There's still few bugs
